convertDecimalToBase(BigInteger, int) - Method in class application.converter
This method converts a decimal number and to a given base: either binary, decimal, octal, or hexadecimal.
converter - Class in application
This class implements a Base Converter Calculator; It can convert any number from and to binary, decimal, octal, or hexadecimal.
converter() - Constructor for class application.converter
This constructor initializes the hashmaps that will contain the sum and product in different bases of the two entered numbers.
convertToDecimal(String, int) - Method in class application.converter
This method converts the input from any base into a decimal.
